Reviews.Title: “UNSANITARY, UNHEALTHY, UNSAFE- AVOID IF POSSIBLE”

Reviews.Content: arrive hotel 3pm catch day lady running front desk doing laundry wait half hour lady comes meanwhile lady gone maintenance decides wash hose leaving stream water luggage wet lady comes rude apologize late appeared english throws key disappears enter dismay toilet paper tree window unmade beds tv broken despite paid decided try night sleeping awoken bed bugs itchy time woke locals arguing fighting outside window sounded decided hope sleep bed bed ants annoyed sleepy decided wake shower bathroom light 5 minutes loud buzzing sound water jet brown water cockroaches bathtub left bathroom tried internet dismay internet disconnected five minutes falling asleep closet towels bug repellent floor woke nauseous decided free breakfast cheer breakfast found moldy bread insects cereal addition half empty cups tolerance hotels left caring nights booked dont mistake waste hundred dollars hotel ruined vacation
